website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice for car owners who only need basic protection or for indoor use – but for serious protection from the elements, check out others on our list.
pros: Lightweight and easy to put on/take off
Suited to protect finished from dust and other particles
Comes with a lock and storage bag
Available in sizes up to 240 inches for cars and SUVs
cons: Material is thin and tears easily
Not waterproof, and not suited to protect against the elements

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed my car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brand new car to protect it from all the dust being created by the construction happening in my apartment’s parking deck. This cover not only provided zero dust protection but actually destroyed my car’s paint job by essentially rubbing all the dust into the car’s surface with each bit of movement from the wind. The car’s originally-flawless paint job is now covered in tiny scratches that will need to be polished out professionally. NOT an extra expense that I was expecting with using this piece of trash cover. DO NOT BUY, especially if your car is brand new and black.
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even fit a small 2dr car!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it arrive with about a million wrinkles that are pretty much permanent... but it doesn't even fit my tiny little Scion FR-S which is a small 2dr car. What a piece of junk!!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: MotoRider42HC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2016 Nissan Maxima perfectly. Sturdy, yet soft for my car. Takes me around 3 minutes to put on by myself only. Well worth it. Now I don't have to wash my car so often. I drive it usually maybe twice a week and I have a field next door to my apartments along with the grass mowers and blowers bliwing dirt and little rocks onto my car. so it was getting dirty & dusty after just 1 day after washing. This is perfect. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Robbins

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so I can wash my car and detail in the night before car shows, so I'm not rushed to do it the same day. I made sure I read all the reviews and I ordered the one Amazon recommended for my car. Well I'm in love with it!! It's easy to put on and off and comes with everything needed to tie and lock down if need be. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Ford Forcus
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 2017 Ford Focus SEL 4 Door Hatchback..since this will be our vacation/weekend get away car..it will stored for long periods..not sure what that would do to the antenna being bent all the time..so put my sewing skills to use for an antenna slot..don't hate..it's functional ..cover goes all the way down to protect wheels ..and tucks nicely under front and rear..
customer_reviews.author: John Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless in the rain
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not water proof. It is basically the equivalent of laying paper towels on top of your car to protect it. Another user posted a picture of his car being soaked under this cover which is accurate. Water soaks right through the cover and with water comes the dust. When the weather dries out, you basically have a soaked car underneath and this cover promotes mold, algae, and dust on the paint. It fits my 1999 Miata pretty well and is very budget friendly compared to other covers, so I am giving it 2 stars instead of one. Basically, this cover is more cheap chinese junk. It is more trouble than it is worth to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year from Amazon on July 19, 2019. Today, it's in pieces and dust. There's another review that explains how bad this dissolves. I think if you're going to use it for about 6-9 months that would be okay. But when you buy a car cover, you expect it to last longer that just a year.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette V. Fong

customer_reviews.title: so good. The material looks like the Kimberly-Clark paper based ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The material looks like the Kimberly-Clark paper based weave they started using some 20 years ago. Should be fine for indoor use as long as the mice don't like it. One thing is that it appears the supplier/manufacturer vacuums the folded cover to shrink the bundle down for boxing. I guess that the material cannot be treated first with non-wrinkle chemicals as it has a billion of them when unfolded, just looks tacky. You can't wash it as it has a paper base I think. But to keep dust away from the paint is it's main purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Utter GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! It’s been just a few months, Zero rain or wind here in Los Angeles, just sunny days and it’s actually ROTTING. Just crumbling into pieces. I haven’t even tried taking it off more than once. I guess sunlight is just too much to ask for this car cover to handle. I’ll add pics soon. Just don’t even bother with this steaming turd.
customer_reviews.author: Malibudep

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover before and was very pleased by the quality of cover the first time, naturally I bought two more because I thought they were great covers. This time around they were not the same as the first one I ordered, a lot thinner and less fitted then the first one, the news ones also lack the corner Velcro straps and logo printed on the first one I bought. These are garbage and a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: kalei haia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Low Cost Way to Cover Your Car
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I needed a dust/pollen cover for my 1967 Olds 442 in the garage. Fits good and its easy to put on and take off. Comes in a tiny vacuum packed plastic bag and there are so many wrinkles I doubt they will ever relax. I've had $300 high end covers in the past on other cars and just did not want to spend that kind of money for a car in a garage. My car is 206" long and the cover says it's 228" and its close to max stretched - hope that helps anyone else trying decide on size.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Eh not so good.. but covers the whole car
customer_reviews.text: Covers okay but Let's dirty water through and stuff from the trees, so makes it useless for me.. a hassle when wet everything gets dirty, makes the car even dirtier.. maybe look for a better one that's not really breathable..
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Moroccan

customer_reviews.title: Average cover, thin and lightweight material
customer_reviews.text: The car cover is thin and quality is average at best. I used it outdoors for a Honda CRV. It was too small for my car, but the next size up would be too big. I do have a rack on my car so that made the fit harder. The material of the cover ripped when I removed it; it might have caught against the rack. I think the description is accurate; it is to prevent dust, not rain or outdoor factors. If you are using this indoors in your garage, it would be fine. It won't last past 6 months if you use this outdoors and remove it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: DomL

customer_reviews.title: Not really for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: My mistake to try to use for outside, really. Seems to be intended to cover your car while in the garage. Seller says: "Offers the Basic protect for your cars,more suitable for indoor use and limited outdoor use" I suppose if you had a very expensive car in a garage it might be useful, but then you'd probably be able to afford a more expensive cover.
customer_reviews.author: Josquin DesPrez

customer_reviews.title: not terrible. However
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, and the price, not terrible. However, NOT acceptable for a black car. It's just not that soft, and the Velcro straps on each corner are stiff & brittle, a car finish's worst nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Burke W.

customer_reviews.title: Almost lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Product had promise. It just disintegrated. Holes everywhere. If you need something to last a few months, it's ok. Lasted me almost 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mannix

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these that we bought. The 1st one fit well, but we inadvertently damaged it after 6 months and had to replace it. I went into Amazon and did a reorder from the original purchase order. The new one did not fit at all and was designed differently from the original. I returned thinking it was just a mistake in shipping, but the next was exactly the same. It's advertised to fit a car 200" in length, but it does not. If you own a KIA Optima, Honda Accord, Toyota Camary, it won't fit. I contacted Amazon customer service and they contacted XCar, but nothing was done and no explanation was offered.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: This is most suitable for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star product for indoor use. I use for outdoors for keeping the sun and dust and bird stuff off the car in Maryland summers. I don't think it is suitable for Florida or Texas sun. It is not rainproof but does dry quickly after a rainstorm. So far happy with it since only paid less than $30.00 for it . Hey, it's really decent for the money , but not a full time outdoor all weather cover as per the the description.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice it comes with a lock
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: says fits cars "up to 200 inches" but just snugly fits over a 180" long Jetta. This is my 2nd XCAR cover-the first is covering patio furniture. Nice it comes with a lock, though I am not using it. It also comes with a kind of storage bag which I use for sleeping bags, a nice bonus. The elastic at the end popped under the Jetta bumpers, holding it securely.
customer_reviews.author: eric_the_redder

customer_reviews.title: Not for the outdoor parking
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this cover is suitable for outdoor parking, although the price is quite reasonable, if it is parked outside, the quality will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good product well fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2003 Camry great. Had it for about 3 months now. Nice little tiedown in the back if needed and thee holes for the bungie across the bottom are nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Myris

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for indoor use.
customer_reviews.text: The California sun killed this cover in 10 months and it wasn't even continuous use for 10 months. To be truthful, I see now, it does state "limited outdoor use", however it also states its UV repellent and has ties for winds. I would have say the UV repellent is weak. You get what you pay for so for less than $30 this is a good cover for INSIDE the garage. Then again, perhaps $30/yr is not so bad for outside too? I will be spending more on the next one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Turbobuick86

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It's been on a Toyota Corolla parked outside ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's been on a Toyota Corolla parked outside under the trees for two weeks. Stayed in place during the one rainstorm that we have had since putting it on. It was easy to put on, and is so far keeping all of the leaves and bird droppings off of the car. Let's hope it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: THIS is a wonderful and very well made cover... My second one, and love it. Came with a nice lock and cable, too, and a handy storage bag... Soft material.. Perfect...
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Best price around
customer_reviews.text: It’s really too early for in-depth review but so far I’m very happy with the cover based on the price. I keep my car under a garage port, but it protects my 2013 Camry from the birds, bugs and other creatures (raccoons) just fine. Great fit as well, plus easy to remove and replace with the great elastic bands.
customer_reviews.author: Green Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Car Lock for Cover Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I hope this message reaches the seller. The car cover is great. The small padlock 🔒 that comes with the cover fell apart! The locking mechanism actually just came apart and dropped on the ground! Please send a new lock.
customer_reviews.author: M.Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, but fell apart after 9 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but fell apart after 9 months of use. This was due to the sun, the fabric feels super cheap, more like a paper towel. At the 9th month I started seeing holes in the material, mostly on the roof. When I inspected the material at at 9 months the fabric was disintegrating. There are some good features with the Velcro wheel straps. If the material was better quality, it would be a descent product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: what i received is a cheap cover that looks close to the picture but not the same, and it is missing the straps, cable, and lock. again not what is in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: ajamal

customer_reviews.title: Not very protectant
customer_reviews.text: First of all is that is NOT water or dust resistant, basically it’s like putting a sheet on top of the car. What I liked is that it fit my 2019 Ford Mustang, for the price you can’t ask for much ... wish it was better
customer_reviews.author: pat16&16

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from seller
customer_reviews.text: cover is ok - apparently. But one of the black velcro strap that is supposed to hold the cover underneath the car, broke almost immediately. Had to sew it back on. Also it is supposed to come with wire and lock - not included in the package. Probably other items are better in this category. UPDATE: seller contacted me after reading review and offered to send new product. Very pleased with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I have an ‘88 Celebrity that I am restoring. I went off to college and my neighbor didn’t want to look at a beaten car sitting there. So I ordered this cover. It covers every inch of the car! The padlock is a nice bonus. I recommend using a bigger lock though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle w.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Cover for the Money
customer_reviews.text: My dust cover fits my car perfectly and blocks out the dust and keeps my car cooler sitting outside in the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: It's stayed on the vehicle through all the high winds we've had (the car is parked on the driveway outside.) It's doing it's job. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover for the money. Fits a 2007 Hyundai Sonata very well. Front is clearly marked and the fabric seems durable. I am using this with a car stored in a barn, so dust prevention is important. My cover did not come with a cable lock, as described however.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, not for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 2013 Lexus IS250C that is in storage for the winter. Bought the standard 185-200 size, it is loose but not too bad. This cover is not intended for outside storage, ours is in a storage unit. It would not last and is not weatherproof. Didn't use the cable, a pair of wire cutters would easily cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Guard Dad

customer_reviews.title: It covers the car from prying eyes but made of thin material.
customer_reviews.text: It covers the car well but it is made of a thin material. This can be good or bad depending on what you are looking for. It will dry quickly from rain but poofs up when the wind is blowing. My main goal was to stop people from asking about the car, trying to buy it, and/or talk shop about cars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: wanted a dust cover only , works just as advertised , would be a five star if it wasn't for the fact on a highly waxed car it's almost a 2 person job to get it in place , wish the corners were marked
customer_reviews.author: Ahuff

customer_reviews.title: Meh 😑
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start with the size, my car measured 196” length I ordered 200” size and it does not fit (a few inches to short which means either front or rear bumper doesn’t get covered). upon opening one of the straps came off due to poor stitching. Overall this cover has defects but I’m not covering a show car so the price made it worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Good Indoor
customer_reviews.text: Just ok for indoor. Does not keep fine dust off of paint. Low price. Good for quick cover up but next one I buy will have more ply.
customer_reviews.author: RichG

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This item is sized wrong, and its made very cheap. The description is way off, and it won't cover my Charger all the way. I guess it's true what they say, your get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Me!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and gets the job done. Not sure if it’s waterproof or resistant. I got it because there have been cats sitting on my car and leaving paw prints. I spray lemon and orange oils to keep them away but they eventually come back. Gets the job done. I park in a covered car port so I doubt it will ever get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Peretz

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I wasn’t expecting much from it for $25, yet it turned out to be ok. It will not gonna protect your car like premium 5 layer covers, like I have for my BMW. Yet, it will keep the car dust free and protect plastic and paint from being ruined by sun light. Keeps the car body about 10 degrees lower than the car next to it with no cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use them to keep dust off cars in garage and they work perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 200" cover for my 2007 Mustang GT that measures 188" and it wont reach both ends of the car. Returning the cover and hoping the 228" does the trick. If it fit I would give 5 stars, I use them to keep dust off cars in garage and they work perfect for that. Does have some velcro straps I would suggest being careful with as it will scratch the paint.
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: So far so good protecting our car from the Arizona heat and sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I live in Scottsdale, Arizona and purchased it mainly for protection from the heat. I’m not convinced it will fare well in monsoon conditions yet, it seems very thin. I did not use the cable to secure it, I never could find the grommets. Instead I used several very strong magnets to secure the cover to the underside of the front and back bumpers. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Odubshulaney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cover, nothing better bang for your buck than ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cover, nothing better bang for your buck than this. I purchased it because of the reviews and prices... I thought what have I got to loose if not good no problem, no big investment like the custom made ones. Well... I just love it, very light and easy to maneuver and does the job. I use it on my 2006 C55 that I have in a semi-open garage so it works like a charm! 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Duran

customer_reviews.title: Had to return due to sizing issue
customer_reviews.text: Product itself was great but Sizing recommendation by Amazon for my car was way off so it was too big so had to return. Purchased smaller size and it is a nice fit. Only using on inside storage so cannot say how it will last outside.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Fits well. We are using inside to keep the cats off. You might want a thicker one to use outside.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great inside cover.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about water and warmth, but for keeping dust off the Vette in the garage, THIS IS GREAT. Light enough to make it an easy one person cover-up.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a 1965 Ford Mustang. It fits like it was designed for this car! Easy on, easy off, lightweight and even has a provision for antenna. I can find NO negative issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Coastcowboy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my cover for a 2017 civic hatchback and it fits perfect(185-200 inch cover). Main use is for dust and sun protection since I live in southern California and my black paint and interior can get extremely hot during summer days. Ive had it for about a week and its working well. Keeps my car paint and interior noticibly cooler. Definitely recommend the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The right weight to handle. Sides re more than ...
customer_reviews.text: The right weight to handle. Sides re more than ample and wish more fitted in that regard. Any suggestion to keep patch around antenna from falling off? I am in high heat and the patch glue softens , which makes it impossible to stay on. Would buy again! Do you have a solution for replacement of antenna patch?
customer_reviews.author: Kurt M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. Fits perfect in my Corolla 2020 stay still even in strongs winds and keep my car clean. Very happy with my purchased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover with some great features for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Received the cover as described. The elastic is snug so it even fits my smaller car well. Looks to be a good breathable fabric and should be perfect for my use - covering in a garage.
customer_reviews.author: SunCobra

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price but antenna will tear it.
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for the price. If you have a antenna fin it will probably rip a hole in it. See my picture. I use it only bc of dust a small tear is a non issue. But still unfortunately tore when it should not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst car cover I've ever owned it doesn't keep the water out it's not durable there's nothing in the ad that is true mine fell apart the first day what a joke
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: cover requires two people to install. the fabric is stiff and when you try to fasten one end the other slips off. i washed it hoping to soften it but that didn't work. also in comes in a SUPER compressed container making it impossible to return in original box.
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Purchased dec31,2018. Velcro straps didn't last through Feb. Not sure if I want to warranty it or just buy a higher quality one locally. Located in northern Cali, South Bay area (if it helps with the kind of weather it sat through)
customer_reviews.author: derek makin

customer_reviews.title: but i really like this cover
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much for the price, but i really like this cover. I work in the garage a lot woodworking and what not and cannot get my wife to park outside. I bought this to take care of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: DustyBottoms

customer_reviews.title: Great car cover for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off the car! It has a bungee (like) skirt bottom at the front and rear of the vehicle, it stays on nice and snug with plenty of stretch; I do not even use the cable that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered mainly because of the lock. Order came in today and there was no lock,no cable,and no pamphlet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coverage complete.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Designed more to shed water not repel it. Works 4 me.
customer_reviews.author: Rudd 2.0

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: It is not what they offer .. it had an equal one and it was damaged after a year in the interperie .. I thought this was different.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Biondi

customer_reviews.title: Fits long land boats with 4 wheels!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. This is our 2nd unit at 228 in sizing. 1st bought for MBZ 560 SEC, covers the entire car nicely. 2nd unit is for LS460...again, fits over the entire vehicle well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tae C.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OUTDOOR USE AGAINST WATER
customer_reviews.text: Defitely not meant for outdoor use or against rain and moisture. Yes it breathes and stuff but it wicks moisture up as well and car still gets wet. Bought this to alleviate a leaky sunroof. Did not work..
customer_reviews.author: Zach K

customer_reviews.title: very good quality and way cheaper then the ones I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: very good quality and way cheaper then the ones I bought at the local store. I think the brand was budge or something? But they would rip within a week. These on the other hand hold up perfect. So good I bought another one
customer_reviews.author: Jason Acosta

customer_reviews.title: 228" size doesn't fit my 223" car
customer_reviews.text: As the subject says: the largest size, said to fit cars up to 228", is significantly short of covering my 1964 electra 225 (actual length 223"). Other than the size issue, the construction is about what I'd expect -- one light layer, suitable as a dust cover.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this car cover
customer_reviews.text: This car cover did not do what it was supposed to do. The first rain my car underneath was soaked it let the sunshine in and the first small breeds that came along it tore
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OUTSIDE
customer_reviews.text: This car cover apparently is only meant to be used inside. I failed to acknowledge that and bought it to store a car outside. This thing sucks at that. At most all it does is act as sift to let only the finest of dust particles to accumulate on the vehicle. Do not recommend for OUTSIDE storage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like it it covers well and has simple useful features Honda Civic hatchback
customer_reviews.author: Conquistador

customer_reviews.title: Barely fit a Chevy Cruze Blows in the wind and scratched my car
customer_reviews.text: Barely fit a Chevy Cruze Blows in the wind and scratched my car The pad locks are a joke
customer_reviews.author: Mr2Toby

customer_reviews.title: one season product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one year ago and it came apart after the second summer, its appears to get thinner as time goes until it gets so thin it just disintegrates and come apart. But maybe I just got a defective one so well see they replace it??
customer_reviews.author: Warlock

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe them when they say that will work for your car
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use it for my new Camry but was small and scratch my bumper
customer_reviews.author: Jaouad hayti

customer_reviews.title: My NEW car is victim to lilacs & a dogwood ...
customer_reviews.text: My NEW car is victim to lilacs & a dogwood tree at this time of year, as Both line the driveway where i park. This cover prevents the dead, falling flowers/petals, etc., from Sticking to vehicle! Worth every penny. The petals & gooey lilacs 'become one' with the finish, if not washed away or promptly removed... Now it's Covered!! Thanx
customer_reviews.author: S.J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my MBZ SL500. My gardener comes every Monday and seems to relish on blowing all the dust towards my newly washed car. Now I didn't have to get mad anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best car cover to date!
customer_reviews.text: I've previously purchased three other covers through Amazon! Hands down, this is the best for wind and rain.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my GTI-t nicely. Seems durable but time will tell. Keeps the cats from scratching the paint.
customer_reviews.author: robert csehak

customer_reviews.title: car cover
customer_reviews.text: Covering my small convertible, a bit thin but covers well and its doing a fine job
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Foster

customer_reviews.title: doing the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep birds off my car and falling seeds from my trees. I work well and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Basha

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works well
customer_reviews.text: Just using as a dust cover in the garage for winter. Works well. I have no problem recommending this item
customer_reviews.author: James G. Figler

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2010 Jetta GLI like and glove but looks terrible. It was vacuum packed and is nothing but wrinkles. I have had several covers in the past and never this wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: after a year. it tears down
customer_reviews.text: bought this cover 2017 Sep, but started putting it on my car 2018 Apr. and last month. it teared down after strong wind. so sad. i will need to buy new one now. will choose something else i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Xue

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: If your going to use this on your car in the garage it would be ok. It is not suitable for outdoor everyday use. I had it on my mustang outside, it disintegrated after 3 months....For the price it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: virginia a.

customer_reviews.title: HOLES!
customer_reviews.text: Bought “new” Item didn’t fully cover my compact car even though it stated it was longer then my car Last and most important multiple large holes similar to cigarette burns all over the cover . Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 1963 T-Bird perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cover it is easy to put on and is easy on the car finish. My car is 205" long and 75" wide. The 200 - 228 inch cover is ideal. I will only be using it in my garage for dust reasons so do not expect any problems with the cover. Attached are some photos to show the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Harold B.

customer_reviews.title: patch that comes with it for antenna hole was pretty mush useless
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 1966 mustang coupe, did exactly what I needed it for, keeping dust off it while its in the garage, patch that comes with it for antenna hole was pretty much useless, I put a grommet in its place
customer_reviews.author: W. Longeill

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Have used it during the summer for three years. Still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Willene Hood

customer_reviews.title: nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I returned it without use as it was the same material as the cover I was already using. Was hoping for a lighter weight cover.
customer_reviews.author: From Houston

customer_reviews.title: Car cover.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2000 Mustang convertible very well. Using for an indoor garage cover to keep dust off. Does very good job. Nice storage bag and cute little padlock to lock up the included cable.
customer_reviews.author: Nammers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, ripped one day use
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality cover. Put on Thursday night when i walked out to look how it held up against the rain item was ripped in half down the seam
customer_reviews.author: norberto

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality, Low price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this cover, and got what I expected. It's thin and doesn't take much of a beating. Probably better for a dust cover for a garaged car.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor car cover
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fit of it. The velcro straps, at the corners, helped a lot. But like most inexpensive car covers, it can't take prolonged exposure to the sun. If you want to protect a car, that's not in direct sunlight, this is a great car cover.
customer_reviews.author: Louis G. Villaescusa

customer_reviews.title: It works for Nissan Juke
customer_reviews.text: It fit my Nissan Juke. Will update later if it doesn't hold up. Was packaged very nicely and was worth the price. Thin compared to others but you get exactly what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: I bought this thing "used" for 8 bucks, best 8 dollars I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: Got this off amazon warehouse deals... Best 8 bucks spent on automotive things period.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Oliver

customer_reviews.title: It’s going to coming good use fits the car perfectly I like it a ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s going to coming good use fits the car perfectly I like it a lot I will use it all the time thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Dibetta

customer_reviews.title: Look durable and cable tie option, the wind withstand not to pick up.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my subaru need for storage, the weight is good enough for wind tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L. Lehoang

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I live in Tampa Florida and purchased for my classic Corvette. This cover does not resist water and by holding the water has damaged my car all over. My mechanic quoted my repair at $1800 to repaint and now the paint will no longer be original. I would not suggest purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Grewal

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on water resistance or durability yet. Seems like a good product. Fit my car well. So far I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey lievens

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: For 20 bucks I really can't complain. I had a sharp corner on the car and it sliced through the cover easily, so it is a bit thin. Overall, for a cover to keep the dust off, it works just fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit for a Ford Fusion
customer_reviews.text: It's a snug fit for my Ford Fusion 2014 but it does the job. Started parking outside and just wanted to protect from tree and bird droppings. A larger size would be ideal to fully cover the bumpers (both are slightly exposed). Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: I just polished my black accord and immedeiately covered it with the XCAR Breathable Dust Cover. I garage my car and the dust is a problem: but not anymore. This cover takes only 3 minutes to install or 1 minute to remove. Certainly worth the effort if you love your car. The more you use it the easier I find it. Great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beer

product_meta.title: XCAR Breathable Dust Prevention Car Cover-Fits Sedan Hatchback Up to 200 Inch in Length
feature_bullets: Fit cars up to 200 inch.Double stitch seams and Elastic hems,snug fit car covers
Free cable lock and strap with buckle to protect your car cover in heavy wind from blowing off
UV protection fabric-offers the Basic protect for your cars, suitable for indoor and outdoor use
Free storage bag and Antenna patch included.
One Year Warranty. Fits for Dodge Charger Toyota Camry Corolla Honda Civic Accord
